name: redAces pre-alpha demo
description:
Side-view multiplayer dogfight game in Soviet dieselpunk setting with fun arcady physics, interactive levels and madskillz gameplay.

Simple and easy to pick plane controls (throttle and pitch) allow for a rich emergent flight play with a variety of tricks and maneuvers.

Harpoon allows players to capture and swing interactive game objects as well as other player's planes (akin to Half Life's gravity gun or the rope in Worms games), adding more expressive ways to evade and attack both on the plane and on foot.
